install.name: JW FLV Player
install.author: Highwood Design
install.description: Adds JW FLV support to hwdVideoShare

param.name: bgcolor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: The background color of the controlbar and playlist. This is white with the default skin. .

param.name: fgcolor
param.label: Foreground Color
param.description: The color of all icons and texts in the controlbar and playlist.

param.name: lightcolor
param.label: Light Color
param.description: The color of an icon or text when you rollover it with the mouse. If you set this, also set the frontcolor, so the rollovers also have a rollout.

param.name: screencolor
param.label: Screen Color
param.description: The background color of the display.

param.name: controlbar
param.label: Control bar
param.description: Position of the controlbar.

param.name: logo
param.label: Logo
param.description: Location of a logo image.

param.name: skin
param.label: Skin
param.description: The location of a skin SWF file.

param.name: autostart
param.label: Autostart
param.description: Automatically start playing.

param.name: link
param.label: Link URL
param.description: Link to an external site.

param.name: linktarget
param.label: Link Target
param.description: The browser frame where link from the display are opened in.

param.name: bufferlength
param.label: Buffer length
param.description: Number of seconds to buffer before starting.

param.name: displayclick
param.label: Display Click
param.description: Action to perform when clicking the display.

param.name: fullscreen
param.label: Allow Fullscreen
param.description: Enable the fullscreen functionality.

param.name: mute
param.label: Mute
param.description: Mute the player on startup.

param.name: quality
param.label: High Quality
param.description: Toggle high-quality playback.

param.name: repeat
param.label: Repeat
param.description: Continously repeat playback.

param.name: stretching
param.label: Stretching
param.description: Resize mode of display content.

param.name: volume
param.label: Volume
param.description: Startup volume.

param.name: start
param.label: Start
param.description: Position in seconds where the playback should start.

param.name: abouttext
param.label: About Text
param.description: Custom text for the Right Click on the video player. (Only users who have a licensed version of the JW FLV Player will be able to use this option.)

param.name: aboutlink
param.label: About Link
param.description: Custom link for the Right Click on the video player. (Only users who have a licensed version of the JW FLV Player will be able to use this option.)
